about_the_game:
Anyway, the world has already been destroyed, let's have a leisurely doomsday outing!

In a world that has already been destroyed, leisurely explore the various aspects of the old era, collect old objects before the world's destruction, and enjoy this eerie journey!

Game elements:

■Experience post apocalyptic survival, walk your own path under the lonely starry sky

■Collect old items from the past, some will make your journey more interesting, while others will come in handy

■Explore unknown areas and see the various remnants left behind before the world was destroyed

■Piecing together fragmented information to understand the secret behind the entire world becoming like this

Thank you for your playing :)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows® 8.1/10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4340 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGL / VRAM 1GB or better
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display
